meaningMnemonic: The <radical>clothes</radical> radical and the <kanji>clothes</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Surprising!
readingMnemonic: An <reading>ea</reading>gle (い) sees a pile of your <kanji>clothes</kanji> and lays an <reading>e</reading>gg (え) in them. The eagle’s egg needs a soft warm place to incubate, and your pile of clothes is the perfect place.
